These sunglasses are really sharp!  The solid black frame against the brown of the lens is very striking.  Although the hinges are not the bend-back style, the rims feel very sturdy.  I tend to put my sunglasses up on my head when going indoors and appreciate that the nose pieces are molded plastic, not the screw-on rubber pieces that easily get caught in my hair.  I appreciate that these glasses are not overly large on my face and fit comfortably, while providing a reasonable level of shade from the sun.These sunglasses also come with a handy cleaning cloth, a soft drawstring pouch, and a tool for glasses repair, if needed.
